ss-entry-simple.content-note: Note: The kroon was included in the second European exchange rate mechanism (ERM II) from June 2004, with a central parity of 1 euro = 15.6466 kroons. On 1 January 2011 the euro was introduced to circulate alongside the kroon until 14 January, after which period the euro was formally adopted as the sole official currency of Estonia.
